/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, filled with cars and buses, stretches out below, reflecting the rhythm of urban life. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the street, their facades a testament to the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the view.
